item.title: Adding Posts
item.description:
Table of Contents

  • Adding articles via github

Adding articles via github

Content on this Rapydli web page can be directly be edited in github. The pages are maintained in the following directory.

We have not yet made the pages automatically published to github once they are uploaded, but that can be done in future.

Please add your articles to the directory

  • _posts

you can use a previous article as template. The articles are written in markdown. Hence it is trivial to contribute.

In case you like to generate the documentation locally you can checkout the content from github. Than in the response directory you can say:

’’’ make ‘’’

In case you wantt to publish it to github, say

’’’ make publish ‘’’

item.title: Big Data Deployments in Indiana University Classes
item.description:
Table of Contents

  • Big Data Deployments in Indiana University Classes

Big Data Deployments in Indiana University Classes

Indiana University has incorporated several new courses related to BIg Data analysis. As prt of this they are using the Cloudmesh framework (http://mycloudmesh.org/learning) to develop easy to use deployment scripts. We will be reusing this technology to incorporate deployments for Deep learning modules.

Through the leveraging of cloudmesh modules it will also be possible to provide deployments in clouds through virtual cluster generation and hadoop clusters.
